reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 76/01: TAX MATTERS - TAX RATIOS UNDER SUBSECTIONS 366 (4.1) AND 368 (4.1) OF THE ACT
reg_info.reg_name_text: TAX MATTERS — TAX RATIOS UNDER SUBSECTIONS 366 (4.1) AND 368 (4.1) OF THE ACT
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 76/01: TAX MATTERS - TAX RATIOS UNDER SUBSECTIONS 366 (4.1) AND 368 (4.1) OF THE ACT
reg_info.act_under: Municipal Act   Loi sur les municipalités

content.content:
1. The following tax ratios are prescribed for the purposes of subsections 366 (4.1) and 368 (4.1) of the Act:  Property Class

Multi-Residential
Property Class

Commercial Classes

Industrial Classes


Tax Ratio 

2.74

1.98

2.63 O. Reg. 76/01, s. 1.

content.content: 2. This Regulation applies with respect to the 2001 and subsequent taxation years. O. Reg. 76/01, s. 2.
